Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers advice in the following areas: benefits, immigration, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support (but not appeals) and relationship breakdown. Home visits. Helps with disability, Social Fund and Housing Benefit reviews. Represents at Disability and Social Security Appeal Tribunals. Specialist workers for debt, welfare rights and immigration (up to level 3). Provides community based advocates, including outreach advice sessions for Asian carers and families with young children. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm (office times); Mon 9.30am-2pm (drop-in advice sessions), Thurs 10am-1pm (general phone advice), appointments by arrangement, call back advice available
